summary.span: 使用線形漸層繪製區域。

span.span: Paints an area with a linear gradient.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A使用線形漸層繪製區域。A paints an area with a linear gradient. 線性漸層定義線條的漸層。A linear gradient defines a gradient along a line. 線條結束點由定義和線性漸層的屬性。The line's end points are defined by the and properties of the linear gradient. A筆刷繪製其此線條。A brush paints its along this line. 預設的線性漸層是斜線。The default linear gradient is diagonal. 預設值，在線形漸層的是 (0，0)，正在繪製的區域的左上角和其是 (1，1)，正在繪製的區域的右下角。In the default, the of a linear gradient is (0,0), the upper-left corner of the area being painted, and its is (1,1), the lower-right corner of the area being painted. 在對角線路徑插補中產生的漸層的色彩。The colors in the resulting gradient are interpolated along the diagonal path. 下圖顯示的對角線漸層。The following illustration shows a diagonal gradient. 已新增的一行從起始點至結束點的漸層插補路徑。A line was added to highlight the interpolation path of the gradient from the start point to the end point. ![對角線性漸層的漸層軸](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-diagonalgradientaxis.png "對角線性漸層的漸層軸")![Gradient axis for a diagonal linear gradient](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-diagonalgradientaxis.png "Gradient axis for a diagonal linear gradient") 對角線性漸層A diagonal linear gradient 下圖顯示相同線性漸層，但是會具有反白顯示的漸層停駐點。The next illustration shows the same linear gradient, but with highlighted gradient stops. ![線性漸層的漸層停駐](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-4gradientstops.png "漸層停駐在線形漸層")![Gradient stops in a linear gradient](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-4gradientstops.png "Gradient stops in a linear gradient") 具有反白顯示的漸層停駐的對角線性漸層A diagonal linear gradient with highlighted gradient stops 您可指定並不完全填滿區域所繪製的漸層軸。It is possible to specify a gradient axis that does not completely fill area being painted. 當發生這種情況時，屬性決定繪製其餘的區域的方式。When this occurs, the property determines how the remaining area is painted. ## Freezable 功能Freezable Features A是一種物件，並因此可凍結來改善效能。A is a type of object and therefore can be frozen to improve performance. 如需有關資訊功能，例如凍結和複製，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For information about features, such as freezing and cloning, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
